job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Olio Apps is looking for our next software engineer! We are a small but talented group of full stack developers focused on meeting and exceeding our customer’s&nbsp;expectations when it comes to delivering their mission critical projects. Those run the gamut of web apps, native mobile apps, web service backends, and experimental prototypes.</p><p><br></p><p>If you are a great communicator, love honing your technical skills, and enjoy building software that people will rely on in their daily lives — we’d love to hear from you!</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Analyze requirements and mock-ups to create actionable, estimated ticket work items</li><li>Create technical designs encompassing the algorithms, patterns, and tools needed to accomplish the tasks at hand</li><li>Build reusable components, and aggregate those building blocks into features</li><li>Write unit tests and integration tests to ensure quality of work</li><li>Participate within a highly collaborative agile software development lifecycle</li><li>Create and receive high quality pull requests which enhances the overall quality of the engineering team</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in computer science or software engineering; or equivalent experience</li><li>Effective and proactive communicator, with a strong growth mindset</li><li>Demonstrated experience in React Native</li><li>High proficiency with Typescript and Javascript</li><li>Proficiency in using modern web development technologies and techniques, including AJAX, HTML5, CSS, Responsive Design, web services</li><li>3+ years of experience in active software project development</li><li>2+ years working with React / React Native</li><li>2+ years experience with Redux, Redux Saga, or equivalents&nbsp;</li><li>1+ years experience working with either Go, Java, Swift, Objective C, or Python</li><li>1+ years experience in building web services and API backends</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Employment Type</strong></p><ul><li>Full Time</li></ul>
